article_title: Minor Injuries In Single Vehicle Rollover Crash
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

The driver involved in a rollover crash in Sioux Falls received minor injuries Sunday afternoon.

Just before 12:30 p.m. Sunday, South Dakota Highway Patrol said a Chevrolet Blazer was traveling northbound on Interstate 29. The vehicle left the road north of 41st Street and rolled in the median.

Troopers said the driver was wearing his seatbelt and walked away with scrapes and bruises.
